title: Board Levels?
body: I can't comment on anything here. when I try it says "you must be level 6' (or twelve) 'to comment". level in what? My account in-game is level 30 and I do not see a single number in the boards, so what are these blockers talking about? is it because i don't play ranked?

replies.body: Sometimes a boards profile needs to sync with the account, especially if posting for the first time.  It looks like your post here has updated everything!  Let me know if you still have any issues posting!
